body_html:
Hi @fchollet Thank you very much. That solves my issue, however I'm still concerned about the different behaviour?

Is there a reason why, for the exact same model, I would be getting model.uses_learning_phase <- False in Tf 1.1 and True in TF 1.2?

Btw, great article yesterday! Looking forward to today's! :D

body:
Hi @fchollet Thank you very much. That solves my issue, however I'm still concerned about the different behaviour?

Is there a reason why, for the exact same model, I would be getting model.uses_learning_phase <- False in Tf 1.1 and True in TF 1.2?

Btw, great article yesterday! Looking forward to today's! :D
